title: Hybrid Inquiry-Based Information Technology Laboratory Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational information technology concepts and hands-on experience in corporate technology operations
context.additional_context: Builds practical environments via smartphone-based VR simulations, utilizing collaborative tools among learners

learning_goals: Identify three or more network security vulnerabilities and propose countermeasures through VR simulations based on real corporate cases
Perform cloud system failure scenario resolution processes with over 80% accuracy through team-based inquiry activities
Establish resolution strategies by applying ethical decision-making frameworks when ethical issues arise in big data analysis simulations

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
